extDescription.description: Short description of the extension to be displayed in the UI and on AMO

buttonDescription.description: Tooltip of the browser toolbar icon.

hoyoverseLogin.message: Please log in to account.hoyoverse.com, then to hoyolab.com, each site in a new tab. Don't close the tabs. Go back and press the GGMarket plugin icon.
hoyoverseLogin.description: Instructions to log in to account.hoyoverse.com

hoyoversePermission.message: Do you give GGMarket permission to copy essential cookies from account.hoyoverse.com and hoyolab.com?
hoyoversePermission.description: Permission to copy essential cookies from account.hoyoverse.com

steamLogin.message: Please log in to steamcommunity.com, then to store.steampowered.com, each site in a new tab. Don't close the tabs. Go back and press the GGMarket plugin icon.
steamLogin.description: Instructions to log in to steamcommunity.com and store.steampowered.com

steamPermission.message: Do you give GGMarket permission to copy essential cookies from steamcommunity.com and store.steampowered.com?
steamPermission.description: Permission to copy essential cookies from steamcommunity.com and store.steampowered.com

robloxLogin.message: Please log in to roblox.com in a new tab. Don't close the tab. Go back and press the GGMarket plugin icon.
robloxLogin.description: Instructions to log in to roblox.com

robloxPermission.message: Do you give GGMarket permission to copy essential cookies from roblox.com?
robloxPermission.description: Permission to copy essential cookies from roblox.com

noauth.message: Please, log in to game service first.
noauth.description: Remind user of logging in to game service

thankyou.message: Thank you, cookies are successfully saved in your browser local storage.
thankyou.description: Inform user about successful cookies saving
